channel.title: [QUESTION] Basic website [HELP]
channel.description:
Hi,
I've created a simple website in html. It has multiple page's, links ect. I was wondering about a 'sign up' page. So like moparscape people can make an account. Then there infomation will be saved into a database but i don't know how to do such thing. I was just wondering if anybody can help me/give advice. NO I AM NOT MAKING FORUMS. NIETHER WOULD I LIKE TO USE A TEMPLATE.
I want to do this from scatch, please reply.. Thanks alot.
